actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to impose a moratorium on new and additional student transportation.

summary.text: Student Transportation Moratorium Act - Provides that the implementation of any order of a court of the United States entered during the period beginning with the day after the date of enactment of this Act and ending with July 1, 1973, shall be stayed to the extent it requires, directly or indirectly, a local educational agency: (1) to transport a student who was not being transported by such local educational agency immediately prior to the entry of such order; or (2) to transport a student to or from a school to which or from which such student was not being transported by such local educational agency immediately prior to the entry of such order. Defines the terms used in this Act.

titles.title: A bill to impose a moratorium on new and additional student transportation.
